content:
It's not very clear. I thought that we had to keep the integer part of the percentage.
For example :
If foxes is 81, then 10% is 8.1
You want       :  Math.floor(81 - 8.1) = 72
i understood : 81 - Math.floor(8.1) = 73
You should add an example.
Tanya2007 made the same mistake :
https://www.codingame.com/clashofcode/clash/report/32568813b19765d43b3e33bb7f9357ebf613139

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun game and easy to solve, uses conditions and loops!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Interesting problem that would work well in both game modes and easily solvable in the 13 minutes. Nice puzzle.

Very fun idea, good job.
If you could just format the "commands" for each month so that it is easier to read? Also, see Sentius' comment, please make clear, that the changes must happen in the given order.
Reply if you want, so I can get back and approve your contribution.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: The problem is easy to solve in less than 5 minutes, the description is clear. The only thing i want to point out is that you could specify that the changes in population happen in the same order as the description, just for clarity. Good job!

1. Please format all the variables in the Input/Output/Constraints section.
2. "Line 1" and "Line 2" are preferred to "first line" and "second line" for simplicity.
Thank you.
